“正常”维生素B12水平可能无法阻止大脑下降研究人员确定了当前被接受为正常现象的B12水平与神经损伤或损伤标记的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/normal-vitamin-b12-levels-may-not-prevent-brain-decline.aspx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/normal-vitamin-b12-levels-may-not-prevent-brain-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fb411E3-2978-4A37-4A37-801E-719D7B5B5B056B Mon, 24 Feb 2025 07:26:00 -0500 "Normal" vitamin B12 levels may not prevent brain decline
将ASO发现程序带入动物模型的考虑因素在ASO的帮助下，ALS治疗可以大大推进。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/considerations-for-taking-aso-discovery-programs-into-animal-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/considerations-for-taking-aso-discovery-programs-into-animal-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f153963-79b0-4f35-a842-7e027040a7 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 07:14:00 -0500 Considerations for taking ASO discovery programs into animal models
研究解锁心脏炎症的关键差异一群与国际科学家合作的柏林研究人员发现，COVID-19引起的心脏炎症差异，抗COVID-19-19疫苗接种和非covid-19-19-19心肌炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-unlocks-key-differences-in-hern-warmt-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-unlocks-key-differences-in-hern-warmt-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74080189-3BFB-4944-9D4F-2647F62044D0 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 06:12:33 -0500 Study unlocks key differences in heart inflammation
新服务可以削减老年人的住院入院，并节省NHS钱一项旨在支持开始变得脆弱的老年人的新服务，可以将紧急住院的入院减少超过三分之一，并节省NHS资金，并找到了由UCL研究人员领导的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/new-service-could-could-could-cut-hospital-admissions-for------------ and-dopts-and-and-save-save-nhs-money.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/new-service-could-could-cult-cut-hospital-admissions-for------------ and-demd-and-and-and-save-nhs-nhs-money.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A144E152-5411-4CCE-BF73-69A9B6733E0D Mon, 24 Feb 2025 06:04:08 -0500 New service could cut hospital admissions for older adults and save NHS money
体育锻炼可以帮助结肠癌幸存者与普通人群生存率相匹配根据Wiley Online在同行评审的美国癌症协会杂志（American Cancer of American Cancer Society）发表的一项最新研究，体育活动可能有助于结肠癌幸存者实现与普通人群类似的长期生存率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/physical-activity-could-could-chelp-colon-colon-cancer-survivors-mather-match-match-gonneral-propulation-urvival-survival-Rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/physical-activity-could-chelp-colon-colon-cancer-survivors-match-match-goneral-propulation-urvival-survival-Rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17d993Ae-3ff4-4670-BA6E-7B92BC19D977 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 05:55:26 -0500 Physical activity could help colon cancer survivors match general population survival rates
蒙大拿州的医疗补助扩张难题尽管担心国会和特朗普政府可能为医疗补助计划计划了什么，但蒙大拿州领导的立法机关和共和党州长似乎准备好将州的医疗补助扩张计划保持在今年夏天的预定结束日期之外。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/montanae28099s-medicaid-expansion-conundrum.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/montanae28099s-medicaid-expansion-conundrum.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95643bba-331d-457e-9d9e-d9e-d9e-d85ce58c5fe0 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 05:39:50 -0500 Montana’s Medicaid expansion conundrum
特朗普在他的竞选活动中冻结了2025年的项目。现在，它的蓝图是他的医疗保健剧本。很少有选民可能希望唐纳德·特朗普在政府的头几周内从美国总理联邦癌症研究局削减数十亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/trump-froze-froze-project-2025-in-his-campaign-now-now-is-now-is-blueprint-is-his-his-his-hishealth-health-health-playblay-playbook.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/trump-froze-project-project-2025-in-his-his-campaign-now-now-inow-is-blueprint-is-his-his-hishealth-histh-hishealth-playblay-playbook.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be0bfc6f-3b43-43b43-4aaf-a003-3dcae55555 ed673 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 05:35:29 -0500 Trump froze out project 2025 in his campaign. Now its blueprint is his health care playbook.

阿片类药物的麻醉减少心脏手术中与阿片类药物的不良事件宣布了有关心血管创新和应用杂志的新文章出版物。越来越多的证据表明，阿片类药物的麻醉（OSA）降低了与阿片类药物相关的不良事件。本文探讨了OSA是否可以改善心脏手术后的初始恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/opioid-sparing-anesthisia-reduces-reduces--opioid-rec-------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/opioid-sparing-anesthisia-reduces-reduces-opioid-real- cor--forderated-realderated-fordverse-forversevents-in-cardiac-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf3fb5ac-9447-4143-bf47-785bcf9bbb4f5 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 01:44:00 -0500 Opioid-sparing anesthesia reduces opioid-related adverse events in cardiac surgery
高GATA6表达预测胰腺癌的预后改善这篇新的评论文章强调了胰腺导管腺癌（PDA）中GATA6（转录因子）的关键作用。该文章探讨了GATA6在癌症进展中的双重作用及其作为生物标志物和治疗靶标的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/high-gata6-express-predicts-predicts-mimpredcomes-inccomes-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/high-gata6-express-predicts-predicts-mimpredcomes-incomes-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=172AF27D-370C-4574-900F-E248DF89841D Mon, 24 Feb 2025 01:25:00 -0500 High GATA6 expression predicts improved outcomes in pancreatic cancer
